text: Nicholas Joseph Orville Liverpool (9 September 1934 â€“ 1 June 2015) was a Dominican politician and jurist. He was the sixth President of Dominica, from 2 October 2003 to 17 September 2012. Liverpool died on 1 June 2015 in Miami, Florida from a heart attack, where he was receiving medical treatment, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site of the President's Office, Commonwealth of Dominica Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Presidents of Dominica
title: Nicholas Liverpool
